content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Bo. I understand that you are looking for a comfortable and affordable place to live in Mannheim. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains while providing a good living environment for my tenants. Could you please tell me your budget for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 600 Euros per month. I am a student, so I don't need a lot of space. I am willing to negotiate, but I don't want to pay more than 600 Euros.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Understood, Bo. Thank you for being transparent with your budget. Based on the size of the apartment, I propose a rental price of 550 Euros per month. This price takes into account the location and the cost of utilities. I believe this is a fair price for a comfortable and convenient living space in Mannheim. What are your thoughts on this proposal?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I can agree to the price of 550 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding. I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Great to hear that you agree to the rental price of 550 Euros per month, Bo. I appreciate your prompt response and look forward to having you as my tenant. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns during the lease agreement process.
name: Heinrich Heine
